info.title: AI Wrapper Backend API
info.description: Production-ready API for AI image/video generation using Kie.ai as the upstream provider

get.description: Returns the health status of the API and its dependencies
Simple readiness probe
Simple liveness probe

post.description: Validates Telegram init data and returns session token
Validates Telegram WebApp init data and returns session token

init_data.description: Telegram Mini App init data string (window.Telegram.WebApp.initData)
Telegram Mini App init data string (window.Telegram.WebApp.initData)
Telegram Mini App init data string (window.Telegram.WebApp.initData)

post.description: Validates Telegram Login Widget data and returns session token

get.description: Handles redirect from Telegram Login Widget, validates hash, and redirects to frontend with token
Returns the URL to redirect user to for Google authentication

post.description: Exchanges authorization code for session token
Validates Google ID Token and returns session token

get.description: Returns the URL to redirect user to for Yandex authentication

post.description: Exchanges authorization code for session token
Validates Yandex Access Token and returns session token

parameters.description: PKCE code challenge (base64url SHA-256 of code_verifier)
parameters.name: code_challenge

get.description: Returns the URL to redirect user to for VK ID authentication. VK uses OAuth 2.1 with PKCE.

post.description: Exchanges authorization code for session token using PKCE

device_id.description: Device ID returned from VK authorize redirect
Device ID returned from VK authorize redirect
Device ID returned from VK authorize redirect

post.summary: Authenticate via VK ID Access Token
post.description: Validates VK ID Access Token and returns session token

get.description: Returns list of configured authentication providers
Validates token and returns user info

post.description: Generates a new session token for authenticated user

get.description: Returns the authenticated user's profile and credit balance
Returns the authenticated user's generation history with pagination
Returns the current credit balance for the authenticated user
Returns list of credit packages available for purchase

post.description: Initiate a credit purchase. Returns payment URL for redirect.

get.description: Returns credit transactions for the authenticated user
Returns all available image, video, and audio generation models. No authentication required.

post.description: Receives callbacks from Kie.ai when generations complete

get.description: Returns available credit packages and configured payment providers
Returns list of configured payment providers

post.description: Receives payment notifications from YooKassa
Receives payment notifications from RoboKassa
Receives payment notifications from CloudPayments
Legacy webhook endpoint for YooKassa
Creates a new payment for credit purchase via selected provider

provider.description: Payment provider: yookassa, robokassa, or cloudpayments
Payment provider: yookassa, robokassa, or cloudpayments
Payment provider: yookassa, robokassa, or cloudpayments

get.description: Returns user payment history
Get referrer info by referral code
Check if a referral code is valid and get referrer info
Get your referral code, URL, and statistics about referred users
Get history of credits earned from referrals
Get your personal referral code and shareable URL

post.summary: Generate image with Nano Banana Pro
post.description: Generates an image from text, optionally with reference images (max 8, 30MB each).
Creates an image from text using Seedream 4.5. Quality: basic (2K), high (4K).
Edits input images based on prompt using Seedream 4.5. Max 14 images, 10MB each.
Creates an image from text using Flux-2 Pro. Prompt: 3-5000 chars.
Transforms input images using Flux-2 Pro. 1-8 images, max 10MB each.
Fast generation mode. Prompt max 5000 chars.
Highest quality mode. Prompt max 5000 chars.
Generate consistent characters. Requires 1 reference image.
Remix existing characters with new styles. Requires 1 reference image.
Extend and reframe images to new resolutions.
Text-to-image generation. inference_steps: 2-250, guidance_scale: 0-20.
Image-to-image transformation. Strength 0-1 controls transformation intensity.
Precise image editing. Optional mask for targeted edits.
Text-to-image generation. English prompts only.
Creates an image from text using Flux Kontext Pro/Max. Supports various aspect ratios and output formats.
Edits an existing image based on text prompt using Flux Kontext. Safety tolerance max is 2 for editing.
Creates an image from text using GPT-4o (GPT Image 1). Sizes: 1:1, 3:2, 2:3.
Edits images using GPT-4o. Supports up to 5 reference images and optional mask for inpainting.

post.summary: Generate video from text with Grok Imagine
post.description: Creates a video from text prompt. Modes: fun, normal, spicy.

post.summary: Animate image to video with Grok Imagine
post.description: Animates an image or prior Grok task. Use image_urls OR task_id, not both.

post.summary: Generate video from text with Kling 2.6
post.description: Creates a video from text. Duration: 5 or 10 seconds. Sound: true/false.

post.summary: Animate image to video with Kling 2.6
post.description: Animates an image to video. Max 1 image, 10MB.

post.summary: Generate video from text with Sora-2
post.description: Creates a video from text. Frames: 10 or 15. Max 5 character IDs.

post.summary: Animate image to video with Sora-2
post.description: Animates an image to video. Max 1 image, 10MB.

post.summary: Generate video from text with Wan 2.6
post.description: Duration: 5/10/15 seconds. Resolution: 720p/1080p.

post.summary: Animate image to video with Wan 2.6
post.description: Max 1 image (min 256x256px). Duration: 5/10/15 seconds.
Video-to-video style transfer with prompts.
Duration: 6/10 sec. Resolution: 512P/768P. Optional end_image for transitions.
Higher quality. Duration: 6/10 sec. Resolution: 512P/768P.
T2V or I2V (provide input_urls for I2V). Duration: 4/8/12 sec. Audio optional.

post.summary: Generate video with ByteDance V1 Pro
post.description: High-quality text-to-video generation.

post.summary: Generate video with ByteDance V1 Lite
post.description: Fast text-to-video generation.

post.summary: Animate image with ByteDance V1 Pro
post.description: High-quality image-to-video.

post.summary: Animate image with ByteDance V1 Lite
post.description: Lightweight image-to-video.

post.summary: Animate image with ByteDance V1 Pro Fast
post.description: Fast image-to-video generation.

post.summary: Generate video from text with Veo 3.1
post.description: Creates a video from text prompt. Models: veo3 (quality) or veo3_fast (speed). Supports 16:9, 9:16, Auto aspect ratios.

post.summary: Generate video from images with Veo 3.1
post.description: Creates video from 1-3 images. 1 image: reference-based. 2 images: first/last frame transition. REFERENCE_2_VIDEO only works with veo3_fast and 16:9.

post.summary: Generate video from text with Runway Gen-3
post.description: Creates video from text. Duration: 5 or 10 seconds. Note: 1080p only available for 5s videos, 10s videos limited to 720p.

post.summary: Animate image to video with Runway Gen-3
post.description: Animates an image to video. Aspect ratio determined by input image. Note: 1080p only for 5s, 10s limited to 720p.
Video-to-video style transfer using Runway Aleph. Max 5 seconds output.
Transforms an existing video based on text prompt. Max input: 10 seconds, 500MB. Formats: MP4, MOV, AVI. English prompts only.
Upscales an image using Topaz Labs. Factors: 1x, 2x, 4x, 8x. Max 10MB input.
High-quality crisp upscaling. Max 10MB input.
Removes background from an image. Max 5MB, max 16MP, 256-4096px dimensions.
Creates music from text. Models: V4, V4_5, V4_5PLUS, V4_5ALL, V5.
Converts text to speech. Models: multilingual-v2 (default) or turbo-2-5. 21 voice options.

get.description: Returns full details for a generation including result assets.
Returns only the status of a generation (lightweight endpoint).

post.description: Upload an image file for use with image-to-image or editing models
Upload a video file for use with video-to-video models (max 500MB)
